price: (84) Indeed, We established him upon the earth, and We gave him from everything a way [i.e., means].
arabic: إِنَّا مَكَّنَّا لَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ سَبَبٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: innā makkannā lahu fī al-arḍi waātaynāhu min kulli shayin sababan
